name: Computers have feelings too
description:
CONTROLS: WASD (move) SPACE (Interact) 

You are a robot who is confined to his home. There are limited activities to do which will keep you occupied. Keep a watch out for your status bars on the top left, which will indicate how the robot is doing. Good luck, and make sure sanity doesn't get too low...  

Sound Effects: 

https://opengameart.org/content/little-girl-voices
